title: Installation issue: bowtie2
body:
[jw@cn05 jw]$ spack/bin/spack install bowtie2
==> Error: Conflicts in concretized spec "bowtie2@2.4.2%gcc@8.3.1 arch=linux-centos8-a64fx/7ypdr3z"
List of matching conflicts for spec:

    simde@0.6.0%gcc@8.3.1 buildtype=release patches=f7d3a3bc625122dba4f7690dc01b8749703f1cc50314bd1fec061ba2dc482d10 arch=linux-centos8-a64fx
        ^meson@0.56.0%gcc@8.3.1 patches=7a7ff3bffb5c1996faf178da6765d578394624edb96fe9297bf21f2e3cd9ebda arch=linux-centos8-a64fx
            ^cmake@3.19.2%gcc@8.3.1~doc+ncurses+openssl+ownlibs~qt arch=linux-centos8-a64fx
                ^ncurses@6.2%gcc@8.3.1~symlinks+termlib arch=linux-centos8-a64fx
                    ^pkgconf@1.7.3%gcc@8.3.1 arch=linux-centos8-a64fx
                ^openssl@1.1.1i%gcc@8.3.1+systemcerts arch=linux-centos8-a64fx
                    ^perl@5.32.0%gcc@8.3.1+cpanm+shared+threads arch=linux-centos8-a64fx
                        ^berkeley-db@18.1.40%gcc@8.3.1 arch=linux-centos8-a64fx
                        ^gdbm@1.18.1%gcc@8.3.1 arch=linux-centos8-a64fx
                            ^readline@8.0%gcc@8.3.1 arch=linux-centos8-a64fx
                    ^zlib@1.2.11%gcc@8.3.1+optimize+pic+shared arch=linux-centos8-a64fx
            ^ninja@1.10.2%gcc@8.3.1 arch=linux-centos8-a64fx
                ^python@3.8.7%gcc@8.3.1+bz2+ctypes+dbm~debug+libxml2+lzma~nis~optimizations+pic+pyexpat+pythoncmd+readline+shared+sqlite3+ssl~tix~tkinter~ucs4+uuid+zlib patches=0d98e93189bc278fbc37a50ed7f183bd8aaf249a8e1670a465f0db6bb4f8cf87 arch=linux-centos8-a64fx
                    ^bzip2@1.0.8%gcc@8.3.1+shared arch=linux-centos8-a64fx
                        ^diffutils@3.7%gcc@8.3.1 arch=linux-centos8-a64fx
                            ^libiconv@1.16%gcc@8.3.1 arch=linux-centos8-a64fx
                    ^expat@2.2.10%gcc@8.3.1+libbsd arch=linux-centos8-a64fx
                        ^libbsd@0.10.0%gcc@8.3.1 arch=linux-centos8-a64fx
                    ^gettext@0.21%gcc@8.3.1+bzip2+curses+git~libunistring+libxml2+tar+xz arch=linux-centos8-a64fx
                        ^libxml2@2.9.10%gcc@8.3.1~python arch=linux-centos8-a64fx
                            ^xz@5.2.5%gcc@8.3.1~pic arch=linux-centos8-a64fx
                        ^tar@1.32%gcc@8.3.1 arch=linux-centos8-a64fx
                    ^libffi@3.3%gcc@8.3.1 patches=26f26c6f29a7ce9bf370ad3ab2610f99365b4bdd7b82e7c31df41a3370d685c0 arch=linux-centos8-a64fx
                    ^sqlite@3.34.0%gcc@8.3.1+column_metadata+fts~functions~rtree arch=linux-centos8-a64fx
                    ^util-linux-uuid@2.36%gcc@8.3.1 arch=linux-centos8-a64fx
            ^py-setuptools@50.3.2%gcc@8.3.1 arch=linux-centos8-a64fx

1. "%gcc@8" conflicts with "simde arch=linux-None-a64fx" [Internal compiler error with gcc8 and a64fx]

[jw@cn05 jw]$ spack/bin/spack debug report
* **Spack:** 0.16.0-948-9d1d37c432
* **Python:** 3.6.8
* **Platform:** linux-centos8-a64fx
* **Concretizer:** original
[jw@cn05 jw]$
